name: Recipe: Golden Fried Chicken
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Golden Fried Chicken.

value.name: Fowl
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Butter
value.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

value.name: Pepper
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Flour
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Golden Fried Chicken
value.desc: Fowl that has been seasoned and then fried. The seasonings were made into a paste and smeared onto the chicken before it was fried at high temperature. The fragrance alone brings the vivid image of crispy skin and tender meat to mind. One bite and the luscious juices begin to flow. Truly irresistable.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Outland Gastronomy Login Event (Only available during March 17, 2021 - April 01, 2021)</color>
